item.title: How to Build Chatbot
item.description: What chatbots are? Chatbots are the future of software and a new way to provide services through a conversational interface like Messenger, WhatsApp, Slack, Telegram etc. I will show you how to build your own bot and deploy it on Messenger platform in several simply steps using Python, Flask and Heroku. Setup Facebook Developer Account Before you start coding have to create a [Facebook developer account(https://developers.facebook.com/apps/)], Facebook App, Facebook page, and set it all up.
